attributes.action: help us uemployed people get trained to help fight the isis.
attributes.additional_details: let the people of our country help make this a better place and wipe them out.
attributes.background: help us get trained and let the people who wants to help be there and help.

rejection.details:
We're not quite sure what you would like the Government to do.

If you would like the Government to provide support to people who are currently unemployed who would like to join the armed forces, you could start a petition asking for that.
